=head1 NAME

KinoSearch::Search::PolyQuery - Base class for composite Query objects.



=head1 DESCRIPTION

PolyQuery serves as a shared base class for ANDQuery, ORQuery, NOTQuery,
and RequiredOptionalQuery.  All of these classes may serve as nodes in
composite Query with a tree structure which may be walked.







=head1 INHERITANCE

KinoSearch::Search::PolyQuery isa L<KinoSearch::Search::Query> isa L<KinoSearch::Obj>.


=head1 COPYRIGHT

Copyright 2005-2009 Marvin Humphrey

=head1 LICENSE, DISCLAIMER, BUGS, etc.

See L<KinoSearch> version 0.30.

=cut
